guide.title: Gentoo Linux Installer Roadmap
guide.abstract: A roadmap to the 1.0 release of the Gentoo Linux Installer

body.p: This is a roadmap to the 1.0 release of the Gentoo Linux Installer which will occasionally be updated to reflect the current issues and future milestones for the project. For a more detailed roadmap, see the TODO list.

ul.li: Alpha version complete with a functional x86 installer with two front ends (dialog and GTK)
Await the release of the 2005.1 experimental livecd with X.
Allow users to create a custom kernel config during an install.
Partitioning rewrite to use size in MB instead of start and end sectors.
